data.name: Fhtagn Simulator
data.detailed_description:
Once again, you hear whispers in your dreams. The slimy voice, like that of an inorganic substance, chants a long series of obscure syllables. The darkness creeps, and there is a sight cast from the deepest depths. It was the most powerful and unnameable presence. The initial fear that was enough to tear your nerves apart has turned into a sweet serenity, and you understand your mission at this moment. Offer tribute to that great being and wish him to break free from his prison and let chaos come again!

Fhtagn Simulator is a Roguelike card game inspired by numerous deck-building games such as Luck be a Landlord, Slay the Spire, and Monster Train. If you don't save enough tributes within the time limit, you will face punishment from the evil gods resulting in game failure. During the course of the game you will experience various events, as well as obtain various cards, powerful mythical monsters, humble human sacrifices, evil spells and so on. In addition to this, the relics given by the evil gods have the ability to change the character of the game. Use them well to get more tributes!

Gameplay features:

  • Mythical Creatures: Numerous Cthulhu monsters and evil gods make up the different genres.
  • Chaos: Cards are dealt in a chaotic order.
  • Sacrifice: Tributes are offered to break the seal, with the goal of summoning evil gods.
  • Events: A variety of events, with the outcome determined by choice.
  • Card Interaction: Cards' effects are all directed at other cards and affect each other.
  • Dynamic Deck: A balance of decks between constantly eliminating cards and acquiring new ones.
  • Fast-paced: A new round begins with a tap of a button after a card is acquired.

data.short_description: Fhtagn Simulator is a minimalist Roguelike Deckbuilder game that unseals old gods by collecting tributes. You will use various evil mythical creatures, magic and items to form your own deck. Take advantage of the unique combinations between relics and card effects to collect more tributes!
